ComicInfo.Title: Guest Starring Thor
ComicInfo.Summary: OverviewAsgard may be destroyed but will that stop no good mercenaries with much mouth and morally bankrupt archaeologists sifting through the wreckage looking for treasure? WE SAY THEE NAY!!! And is The Mighty Thor happy to find Deadpool pilfering from his hallowed halls? WE SAY THEE NAY!!! AGAIN!!! Still, there be Norse god treasure in them there rubbly hills, so what the hey. But some treasures are best left undisturbed. Particularly the ones containing evil, enormously powerful spirits imprisoned by Odin thousands of years hence. Definitely those ones.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-04 21:47:47. [CVDB246494]
ComicInfo.Editor: Axel Alonso, Joe Quesada, Sebastian Girner
ComicInfo.Characters: Deadpool, Den Vakre, Nolan Curtis, Thor
